engine

Class Engine

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • engine.Engine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEngine, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Engine
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements IEngine
    The Engine allow to manage the world, entities, sound, display, HUD, etc...
    Version:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
